Posts.Content: Apr 26, 2011 12:03AM mogirl wrote: I have my markings and my 2 tiny dot tattoo's( Ouch!)First treatment is Wednesday then only 32 to go. RO said deoderant is ok to use but no lotion right before treatments. I will start out with Aloe Vera gel  first and  that dont work something prescription. I have to drive 1 &1/2 hours there and back each day for treatments. Sure will be glad win this is done, I am so tired from chemo. I need to lose some of the weight I have gained since my dx. but I am still to tired to exercise.
